result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shacorius Detrell Roberts

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts not in court, in custody.  Attorney Aneeq Ahmad in court. Attorney Amy Spanczak in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Off the record. Case scheduled for motion hearing. Defendant not produced. Case adjourned, Branch 16.
Motion hearing scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review.
Exhibit 1 for Motion; Received and Filed.

Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in court with attorney Aneeq Ahmad.  Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status Conference. Discussion with parties. Court addresses defense's motion filed. Court further schedules next court date for a Motion Hearing and sets 08/16/2022 deadline for the State's response. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that effective 7/30/22, this case will be heard in room 503 of the courthouse.  Motion hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Received and Filed. Attachments in Support of Motion to Suppress
Received and Filed. Motion to Suppress Evidence

Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in court with attorney Aneeq Ahmad.  Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in custody.  Patrick T. Franken appeared on behalf of Amy Spanczak for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion with parties regarding outstanding discovery issues. Court schedules next court date for a Status Conference date, and sets 06/03/2022 deadline for filing any motions. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.

OFF THE RECORD- Attorney Aneeq Ahmad in court, defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts not in court, in custody.  Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. All parties appeared via zoom. Defendant not produced. Defense counsel advises that they have received an offer from the state, but need additional time to review with client. Court adjourns case for a Scheduling Conference and sets 05/19/2022 deadline for filing any motions. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in court with Attorney Aneeq Ahmad; both appear by video.  Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 16, Judge Grayson. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Notice of Retainer

Adjustment Number: 22A 014461,
Payable Number: 984838,
Receipt Number: 22RP005830,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. Defense moves to dismiss; motion is taken under advisement. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 4, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in court, in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 8, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in court with attorney Victoria Mccandless.  Defendant Shacorius Detrell Roberts in custody.  Patrick T. Franken appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shacorius Detrell Roberts appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
